section.7: Prayer (Kitab Al-Salat): Prostration while reciting the Qur'an

hadiths.text: Narrated 'Abd Allah (b. Mas'ud):The Messenger of Allah (ï·º) recited Surah al-Najm and prostrated himself. No one remained there who did not prostrate (along with him). A man from the people took a handful of pebbles or dust and raised it to his face saying: This is enough for me. 'Abd Allah (b. Mas'ud) said: I later saw him killed as an infidel
